#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

const string keys[10] = {
    "0 ",
    "1,.?!","2ABC","3DEF",
    "4GHI","5JKL","6MNO",
    "7PQRS","8TUV","9WXYZ",
};

int main() {
    string str;

        string key = keys[str[0] - '0'];    // æŒ‰é”®

        cout << key[counts];    // è¾“å‡º

}
```

#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

const string keys[10] = {
    "0 ",
    "1,.?!","2ABC","3DEF",
    "4GHI","5JKL","6MNO",
    "7PQRS","8TUV","9WXYZ",
};

int main() {
    string str;
    while (cin >> str) {        // ä»æµä¸­è¯»å–è¾“å…¥ä¿¡æ¯
        string key = keys[str[0] - '0'];    // æŒ‰é”®
        int counts = (str.size() - 1) % key.size();    // æŒ‰ä¸‹æ¬¡æ•°
        cout << key[counts];    // è¾“å‡º
    }
    return 0;
}
```
